courses.description: Dan and Wes walk you through the step-by-steps to build a personal computer. They demonstrate the installation of components like a motherboard, CPU, cooling systems, fans hard drives and power supplies.
courses.name: Building a PC
courses.subtitle: Assembly and configuration

courses.description: In this series viewers will be introduced to the basics of the interworking of a computer’s system hardware and the individual components. The series will also tackle the basics of a computer operating system, applications, utilities and navigation. Finally the viewer will be guided through the basics of networking. This series is intended to give an introductory demonstration of the computing environment that most will encounter in todays world.
courses.name: IC3 Computing Fundamentals
courses.subtitle: Global Standard 5

courses.description: The IC3 Key Applications exam and certification is designed to demonstrate a candidate’s basic skill with the most common features found in business productivity programs such as Microsoft Office Word 2010, Excel 2010, PowerPoint 2010 and even Access 2010.  The show is to help the candidate, regardless of computing skills to gain an understanding and a basic working knowledge of these applications.  Other goals you’ll see in the show includes obtaining apps and understanding the terminology surrounding the use of these applications regardless of whether you’re using a desktop computer, tablet or a smart phone.
courses.name: IC3 Key Applications
courses.subtitle: Global Standard 5

courses.description: In this series the viewer will be introduced to terms and the concepts related to one digital presence today on the Internet. The viewer will learn about online concepts such as WiFi, email, web browsers and how to utilize them, digital ethics, citizenship and more.
courses.name: IC3 Living Online
courses.subtitle: Global Standard 5

courses.description: This course is designed to help bring new employees up to speed on the various IT security issues facing companies to day. Its primary use is intended to be as an instructional video shown during the new-hire on-boarding process. By increasing a new-hire's IT security awareness, companies can help to avoid security incidents before they happen.
courses.descriptionMD: This course is designed to help bring new employees up to speed on the various IT security issues facing companies to day. Its primary use is intended to be as an instructional video shown during the new-hire on-boarding process. By increasing a new-hire's IT security awareness, companies can help to avoid security incidents before they happen.
courses.name: Security Awareness Onboarding
courses.subtitle: Increasing a new-hire's onboarding IT security awareness
